articles.title: About
articles.description: Learn more about me and this blog
articles.contents:
About me
I am a post-graduate student pursuing a masters of IT in Business (Analytics) at Singapore Management University.
Before venturing into the beautiful world of analytics, I spent 6 years in the auditing and financial due diligence department at PwC Singapore.
About this blog
This blog is dedicated to showcase my assignments and project work relating to the Visual Analytics course (ISSS608) at Singapore Management University.
